titleStmt.title: [Advertisement] The pleasures of matrimony; intermix'd with variety of merry and delightful stories ... price 1 s. sold by H. Rhodes, at the Star the corner of Bride-lane in Fleetstreet ...
titleStmt.author: Rhodes, Henry.

notesStmt.note: Fragment: may be a newspaper clipping, as it also contains a notice about lost or stolen property.
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
